entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High 10 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle or showers this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 12 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 in the afternoon. High 12 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
